participant_1.background:
I love to eat ice cream, especially when I'm not wearing pants.
I have a hard time opening up to my family, but my friends are my best support.
i love eating barbeque sandwiches and pizza puffs.
My collection of movie tickets reminds me of my favorite films.
I love to bake and care for my dogs.

participant_2.background:
I have a collection of larp weapons and armor.
I usually go for a walk to clear my head.
I like to listen to music that helps me stay focused, especially when I'm organizing my surroundings.
I grew up in the Midwest, where Christmas is a big deal.
my favorite artist was prince.

content.text: Hello, it's nice to meet you.
Hello to you too.  What do you enjoy doing for fun?
I like to bake and cook, I also like to spend time with my dogs.  What about you?
I like to go for walks, listen to music, and read books.  I also collect larp weapons and armor.
That's interesting!  I've never heard of LARP before.
It's a live action role-playing game.  You wear costumes and pretend to be different characters in a fantasy setting.
That sounds really fun!  I'd love to try it sometime.
You should!  There are a lot of groups that play all over the country.
I'll have to look into it.  Thanks for telling me about it.
No problem!  What's your favorite movie?
That's a tough question.  I have a lot of favorites.  But I'd have to say my favorite is The Wizard of Oz.
That's a classic!  I love that movie too.  Do you have any pets?
Yes, I have two dogs.  A black lab named Molly and a golden retriever named Buddy.
Aww, they sound adorable!  I love dogs.  I have a cat named Mittens.
Cats are great too!  I have always loved animals.
Me too!  I think they're the best.
